label: Clamp, John C., Tapas Chatterjee & Gregorio Fernandez-Leborans.  2016. Occurrence of Epistylis anastatica (Linnaeus, 1767) (Ciliophora: Peritrichia) on Mesocyclops isabellae Dussart & Fernando (Crustacea: Copepoda: Cyclopoida) in India, with an annotated checklist of species of Epistylis reported  as Epibionts of Cyclopoid Copepods and resources for their identification. Zootaxa 4168(3): 525–540.
